details.additional_info: The one week Correction / Edit Window, which was scheduled to be opened from October 9th, 2024, has been put on hold.

details.opening_of_correction_window: put on hold until further notice
details.postponement_of_exams: ESE (Preliminary) and ESE (Main) Exams, 2025 postponed to 8th June 2025 and 10th August 2025 respectively
